Title: Tongue Tied
Writer: Marisa Wegrzyn, David E. Kelley (created by), Jonathan Shapiro (created by)
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Nina Arianda, Ana de la Reguera, Tania Raymonde
Plot: On the night of the mayoral election, Billy and his team race to take down the people responsible before they become an unstoppable Goliath.
